previewKeyPoints: Automated lead scoring and qualification processes based on behavioral triggers

props.title: Lead Nurturing Automation Workflow
steps: Capture leads through multiple touchpoints including content downloads, webinar registrations, free trial signups, and contact form submissions with progressive profiling to gather qualification data
Score and segment leads automatically based on demographic fit, behavioral engagement, content consumption patterns, and explicit interest indicators using machine learning algorithms
Deploy targeted nurturing sequences via email, social media, and retargeting ads with personalized content recommendations based on lead score, industry, and stage in buyer journey
Trigger sales alerts and handoffs when leads reach qualification thresholds, providing sales teams with complete context including engagement history and recommended next actions
Continue post-sale nurturing for customer onboarding, upselling opportunities, and retention campaigns while measuring attribution and ROI across the entire customer lifecycle
